reviewText: To the seller you are very kind and Thank you! I bought this set because of my wife for years she would bring up Nip/Tuck and say that she wishes I could have watched it I think she was a big fan as it aired on tv. So I found this set I never told her Till it arrived and she saw it and the look on her face was she was smiling and crying at the same time. We had some gliches with some of the discs but she sat I now everyday I know watching this show everyday I would come home and she would be playing it so I have to say I got into it to you would really love this show.
